channel.title: Adding shop
channel.description: Hello, today i'm adding and shop. I have all information. This i need to write to pawn.config.cfg: shop = 542 This i need to write to shop.cfg: shop = 542 But i don't know what i need to write in shopassistant.java. Maybe some1 can help me? Thank for your time :)

item.title: Adding shop
item.dc:creator: @Get_Blitz Get Blitz
item.description:
@Get_Blitz wrote:

Its simple First go into Shops.cfg and add another one like the rest of them and change the shop id and items.

Next in SpawnConfig spawn a npc where ever you want to.

Then In action handler look for the npc’s that open shops and add something like

Case NPCID:
Return openShop(SHOPID);

I am on my ipod so this might not be 100% right

Read full topic

item.title: Adding shop
item.dc:creator: @mrdrzj mrdrzj
item.description:
@mrdrzj wrote:

you dont need to write anything there, its spawn-config, shops.cfg, and actionhandler
